dialogue.speaker: Child in Line
dialogue.text: Mommy, why is that man smiling at the vegetables?

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Because they're beautiful. Everything is, when you really look.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Especially broccoli. It's like tiny trees having a party.

dialogue.speaker: Cashier
dialogue.text: That'll be $23.47. You having a good day?

dialogue.speaker: Evan

actions.action: moves through grocery store seeing fractals in produce, infinity in aisles
go about routines, unaware they're in a temple
hum with the same frequency as stars
